channel.title: How would I put player rights on this command?

item.title: How would I put player rights on this command?
item.dc:creator: @I_james_I I james I
item.source: How would I put player rights on this command?

item.title: How would I put player rights on this command?
item.dc:creator: @NexondotNet NexondotNet
item.description:
@NexondotNet wrote:

This is what you want -

else if (command.startsWith("getbonus") && playerRights >= 2) { GetBonus(); sendMessage("Successful! - gb"); }

You don’t need a ; after the first command line.

Read full topic
item.source: How would I put player rights on this command?

item.title: How would I put player rights on this command?
item.dc:creator: @I_james_I I james I
item.description:
@I_james_I wrote:

hi guys, I no this is abit stupid, but how would I give this command rights of 2:

else if (command.startsWith("getbonus")); { GetBonus(); sendMessage("Successful! - gb"); }

it may sound easy, but I tried many different ways, but it didnt work…

Many Thanks

James

Read full topic
